definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: Sadly, gentlemen's agreements only work between gentlemen.
sentences.chinese: 可悲的是，君子协定只在君子间有效。

sentences.english: Sex was controlling my life, and I was miserable.
sentences.chinese: 性已经控制了我的生活，我真是可悲，”他说。

sentences.english: The sad truth is that school is pricy.
sentences.chinese: 可悲的事实是学校都是昂贵的。

sentences.english: Pathetic attempts to convince oneself of the superiority of anything connected with Indians. Non-Western medicine.
sentences.chinese: 可悲的企图说服自己优势与印第安人有些许的联系。

sentences.english: The butterfly, he said, is “miserable, isolating, painful.”
sentences.chinese: 蝶泳，他说，是“可悲，孤独，痛苦的。”

sentences.english: Sad that I had to go to Italy to realize that.
sentences.chinese: 可悲的是我居然要到意大利才能参悟到这个道理。

sentences.english: This is a pitiable display of intellectual impotence.
sentences.chinese: 这是智力上软弱无能的可悲表现。

sentences.english: Talk about "results" without measuring them. Sadly, this low-impact approach to corporate philanthropy is too common.
sentences.chinese: 可悲的是，这种效果不明显的公司慈善活动太普遍了。

sentences.english: But sadly, Zainab's father was afflicted by an addiction: gambling.
sentences.chinese: 但可悲的是，他赌博成瘾。

sentences.english: Previously my childish, poor now mature pathetic.
sentences.chinese: 以前我幼稚的可怜，现在成熟的可悲。

sentences.english: Wolowitz: I'm going home to live my creepy, pathetic life.
sentences.chinese: 我回家继续过我的恶心的，可悲的人生。

sentences.english: That scenario is not, sadly, a great test of the author’s imagination.
sentences.chinese: 可悲的是，这一幕并非只是作者想象力一次大胆尝试。

sentences.english: It is a sad fact that she was pulled into the marriage with that man.
sentences.chinese: 她被劝说同那个男人结了婚，这是件可悲的事。

sentences.english: Funny yet tragically true, how ignorance can be to this extent.
sentences.chinese: 竟然无知到这个地步，好笑却又可悲地真实。

sentences.english: Fear of the unknown dominates these pathetic, perverse and despicable beings.
sentences.chinese: 对未知的恐惧主宰着这些可怜，可悲而又可卑的人们。

definition: to regret/to feel that it is a great pity/to feel sorry for sb
